subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey and Zack Wheeler, young right-handers viewed as critical to the Mets’ future, are on “opposite ends of the spectrum” in terms of personality, Dan Warthen says.
snippet: Matt Harvey and Zack Wheeler, young right-handers viewed as critical to the Mets’ future, are on “opposite ends of the spectrum” in terms of personality, Dan Warthen says.
